Starbucks on Tuesday reported better-than-expected quarterly earnings and revenue, despite lockdowns in China weighing on its performance.

articles.author: Ben Schlappig
articles.title: JetBlue's Awful Financial Results: This Can't Be Good - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: While most US airlines reported a second quarter profit, JetBlue reported a loss. What does this mean for the future of the airline?

articles.author: Rina Torchinsky
articles.title: Demand for Workers Fell in June to Lowest Level in Nine Months - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The Labor Department said there were 10.7 million job openings in June, the lowest level since September. Still, total job openings remained well above the number of available workers.
